sentences: Gianni Lenoci (1963 – 30 September 2019) was an Italian jazz pianist and composer.

A reviewer of his 1995 album Existence commented on Lenoci's "fascination with Paul Bley's scalar investigation – he rides his way through to the center of the melody in each case to find the improvising scale, and when he does, he creates arpeggios and skittering skeins of notes to cover it up while opening another door".
